    • Uses of RemoteOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation

      Subinterfaces of RemoteOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  NetworkOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a data transmission operation between two Jobs through a given route in the network.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation that implement RemoteOperation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkOperationDefault
      This implementation will automatically find a new Route using the RoutingProtocol on the host of the parent job's VM each time it is activated.

    • Uses of RemoteOperation in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job

      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job that return types with arguments of type RemoteOperation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<RemoteOperation<?>> JobDefault.getRemoteOperations() 
      List<RemoteOperation<?>> Job.getRemoteOperations()
      Returns a list containing operations that have defined this job as their destination job.
